entry.name: Orks/FlashGitz:Idle#0
entry.value: It's the Boss! Wot do yer want, Boss?

entry.name: Orks/FlashGitz:Idle#1
entry.value: More barrels means more dakka. More dakka means more fun!

entry.name: Orks/FlashGitz:Idle#2
entry.value: Nah, mate, this is my squig. Get yer own!

entry.name: Orks/FlashGitz:Idle#4
entry.value: One green squig, sitting on da wall. Two…

entry.name: Orks/FlashGitz:Idle#5
entry.value: This choppa just isn't big enuff!

entry.name: Orks/FlashGitz:Idle#7
entry.value: Who do yer want me to 'it?
